__e: Listen to me, the old man can't have called you for one simple reason...
No matter what you try, no matter when, No matter how hard you work, I'll always be a step ahead of you for one simple reason.
For the simple reason that I can't tell you what I don't know.
- Everybody has a choice. - Not the common people.
I still say our place is with the common people.
We're not easy people, you and I.
There's no easy way to say this, so I'll just say it.
That might be so,but,you know, You gotta be careful with that easy road.
But you can't say that I didn't give you a choice, but you, you know, you never take the easy way, you...
You know, you really don't appreciate the simple things in life like sitting.
Sometimes one just has to remind people of simple things.
Maybe those simple things aren't as simple as I thought.
Come on, baby. I'll explain everything to you in words of one syllable.
Let me break it down for you, I'll hold your hand like a small child:
Mason, I'm going to make this perfectly simple so you're able to understand.
I understand the common man in a way I never did before.
Because he does not know that I am emerging from the mists of time.
